# is-tab

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                  | Type      | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ---------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `disable`   | `disable`    | Indicates if tab is blocked  | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `isActive`  | `is-active`  | Indicates if tab is active   | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `key`       | `key`        | Key of component             | `any`     | `undefined` |
| `label`     | `label`      | Customized name tab          | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `tabActive` | `tab-active` | Indicates what tab is active | `string`  | `undefined` |
